checking_answers.only_community_checkers_can_like: 维有社区检查员才能喜欢答案。

collaborators.change_roles_and_permissions: Users' roles and permissions can {{ boldStart }}only{{ boldEnd }} be changed in {{ boldStart }}Paratext{{ boldEnd }}. Open the project in {{ boldStart }}Paratext{{ boldEnd }}, on the project window click {{ templateTagBoundary }}{{ templateTagBoundary }}, then {{ boldStart }}Project settings{{ boldEnd }}, then {{ boldStart }}User permissions{{ boldEnd }}. After a {{ italicsStart }}Send/Receive{{ italicsEnd }} in {{ boldStart }}Paratext{{ boldEnd }} and then a {{ italicsStart }}Synchronize{{ italicsEnd }} in {{ boldStart }}Scripture Forge{{ boldEnd }}, their role will come into effect here, once that user logs in with their {{ boldStart }}Paratext{{ boldEnd }} account.
collaborators.connect_network_to_manage_users: User management is disabled while offline. Please connect to the internet to manage users.
collaborators.problem_loading_invited_users: There was a problem loading the list of invited users.

connect_project.choose_the_mother_project: Choose the Paratext project that your project is based on.
connect_project.connect_network_to_connect_project: Please connect to the internet to enable connecting to a project
connect_project.engage_the_wider_community_to_check_scri: Engage the wider community to ensure that the translation is clear, accurate, and natural. Select verses, ask targeted questions, allow discussion of answers.
connect_project.no_connectable_projects: Looks like there are no connectable projects for you.{{ newLine }}Please go to Paratext to register a project to connect to.
connect_project.only_paratext_admins_can_start: ** You must be the Paratext Administrator of a project to start it here. Ask your Administrator to connect to your project then you can also connect to it here after that.
connect_project.translations_will_be_suggested_as_you_ed: Translations for words and phrases will be suggested as you edit Scripture. It is recommended that your project is setup as a {{ boldStart }}Daughter Translation{{ boldEnd }} in Paratext.
connect_project.you_must_be_logged_in_to_paratext: You must login with your Paratext account to connect to a project.

delete_project_dialog.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
delete_project_dialog.delete_cannot_be_undone: This action {{ boldStart }}cannot{{ boldEnd }} be undone. This will permanently delete the {{ boldStart }}{{ projectName }}{{ boldEnd }} project, translation data, questions, answers, and comments.
delete_project_dialog.i_understand_the_consequences: I understand the consequences, delete this project
delete_project_dialog.please_type_project_name: Please type in the name of the project to confirm.

editor.cannot_edit_chapter_formatting_invalid: This chapter cannot be edited because the formatting is invalid. Please fix the formatting in Paratext.
editor.verse_too_long_for_suggestions: This verse is too long to generate suggestions.

question_answered_dialog.consider_creating_new_question: Consider creating a new question instead of editing this question.

question_dialog.add_question_denied: Permission denied: only project administrator can add and edit questions.
question_dialog.enter_a_reference_to_load_text: Enter a reference to load text
question_dialog.must_be_after_scripture_reference: 必须在{{ boldStart }}圣经参照{{ boldEnd }}之后
question_dialog.must_be_same_book_and_chapter: Must be the same book and chapter
question_dialog.question: Question
question_dialog.recording_stopped: The recording for your question was automatically stopped.

roles.pt_consultant: 顾问／审阅员／档案保管员／排字人员

settings.connect_network_to_change_settings: Project settings cannot be changed while offline. Please connect to the internet to make changes.
settings.choose_the_paratext_project: Choose the Paratext project that your project is based on.
settings.delete_project_cannot_be_undone: Once you delete a project, there is no going back. Please be certain.
settings.engage_the_wider_community: Engage the wider community to ensure that the translation is clear, accurate, and natural. Select verses, ask targeted questions, allow discussion of answers.
settings.enable_translation_suggestions: to enable {{ boldStart }}Translate Suggestions{{ boldEnd }} and see more options
settings.select_additional_tools_and_features: Select which additional tools and features are available.
settings.translate_tool_is_always_available: The translate tool is always available to collaborate with other translators working on the same text.
settings.translations_will_be_suggested: Translations for words and phrases will be suggested as you edit Scripture. It is recommended that your project is setup as a {{ boldStart }}Daughter Translation{{ boldEnd }} in Paratext.
settings.users_can_interact_with_each_other: Users can see each other's answers and comments to interact with each other.
settings.users_can_share_the_project: Users can share by inviting a friend to join the project.{{ newLine }}{{ italicsStart }}Administrators{{ italicsEnd }} can always invite others to the project in {{ templateTagBoundary }}Users{{ templateTagBoundary }}.
settings.will_not_delete_paratext_project: This will {{ boldStart }}not{{ boldEnd }} delete your Paratext project, but it will delete any unsynchronized data stored in Scripture Forge. It is recommended to {{ templateTagBoundary }}Synchronize{{ templateTagBoundary }} first before deleting.

suggestions_settings_dialog.settings_not_available_offline: These settings are not available while you are offline.

sync.connect_network_to_synchronize: Please connect to the internet to synchronize this project
sync.something_went_wrong_synchronizing_this_: Something went wrong while synchronizing {{ projectName }} with Paratext. Please try again.

text.book_is_empty: This book is empty. Add chapters in Paratext.
